confidentiality.text:
It is recognised that all the information regarding the Company’s business, practices and policies,
including manuals and other rules and procedures, which may exist from time to time, are valuable, special and
unique assets of the Company and are confidential. The Employee hereby undertakes that during the term
of this agreement, he/she will not disclose any of the foregoing or other information/ correspondence of the
Company or any part thereof to which he/she may have access/ knowledge during his employment with the
Company (including the contents of this Agreement) to any person, firm, Company, association or any entity
for any reason or purpose whatsoever, save as required by law or orders) of the court or with the express
written consent of the Company.
